timeline.bodyText: why not getCredentialsDto and use the DTO's API to retrieve the credentials? As the name Data Transfer Object suggests, it should be used to transfer data to/from the persistence store, right? That way we also wouldn't require this method to have knowledge about the internal structure of the JSON document being stored in the DB ...
